questions.label: In the past three months has anyone punched, slapped, kicked, bite you or caused you any type of physical harm?
questions.questionInfo: Anyone can include your partner, a family member, friend, neighbor, client, stranger, supervisor, colleague, police officer or other persons.

questions.questionInfo: as with the previous question, 'anyone' can include your partner, a family member, friend, neighbor, client, stranger, supervisor, colleague, police officer or other persons.
